artist: Artist: School of Andrea Mantegna; Engraver: Unknown Italian, late 15th - early 16th century
catalogue_raissonne: Hind 1938-48, V 27.21; Bartsch XIII.305.18 (as Zoan Andrea); Boorsch 1992 (exh. cat.), no. 138 (as Mantenga's Premier Engraver)
markings: Watermark: Shield with PS, Briquet 9666 (Paris, 1547); chain lines 22-25 mm apart [see Boorsch and Landau 1992, App. II, pp. 473, 475, 480, no. 17/var.
provenance: Colonel G.A. Cardew (1865–1942), Lugt 1134, London. [Albert Roullier Art Galleries, Chicago]. Herschel V. Jones (until d. 1928); by descent to daughter, Tessie Jones, in lifetime trust, New York (until d. 1968; bequeathed to Mia)
title: Four Dancing Muses
